Carousel.title: Boiler Grants in Westmidlands Birmingham and Glasgow
Carousel.paragraph: With our new A-rated boilers, which will be funded under the ECO4 scheme in all UK, you will have peace of mind that your boiler is working for you – not against you. The free boiler scheme in all UK will improve energy efficiency, reduce your gas bills. You will be also be contributing to reducing the UK carbon footprint.

Carousel.title: Central Heating Grant in all UK
Carousel.paragraph: Our first-time central heating grant in all UK is for customers who are ECO4 qualified and have no central heating system present, in other terms having no radiators. Some examples include only having solid fuel fires, electric storage heaters, gas fire or electric plug-in heaters.

Carousel.title: Cavity Wall Insulation Grants
Carousel.paragraph: The cavity wall insulation grant in all UK is offered to help those who suffer with heat loss due to cavity walls by insulating the air space with a material that inhibits heat transfer. The material immobilises the air within the cavity, which prevents convection, and can substantially reduce the space heating costs of your home.

Carousel.title: Loft Insulation Grants in all UK
Carousel.paragraph: Our loft insulation grants in all UK is where we install insulation boarding in between the rafters underneath existing plasterboard walls to help keep the heat inside. This will save you money on your heating bills!

About.paragraph: Here sat S & A Plumbing and Heating, we are extremely passionate about helping as many people as we can be aware that there is funding for various energy efficiency measures. We want to keep everybody’s gas bills as small as possible – so installing the most efficient measures goes a very long way in reducing those bills. We have been helping potential customers obtain a free, or discounted boiler since 2015! We have a network of underfloor installers, surveyors and gas safe engineers, that stretch from London to Birmingham..
Why: two-year warranty on your new boiler

Services.name: On site survey
Services.text: We offer a free no obligation survey to see if you require any energy saving measures in your home. We will give you all the information on recommendations to allow you to make your own decision.

Services.name: Installation
Services.text: We are funder accredited; we have no middlemen to deal with – ensuring a clean, swift process from start to finish. We aim typically to have your boiler installed within 10 working days of your enquiry.

Services.name: After care
Services.text: We have dedicated account managers that will look after your specific case, ensuring the person helping is with you from the very start. .
